title: The Kodonian Project
text:
Purpose & Goal



The Kodonian Project seeks to demonstrate that the Universal Genetic Code contains an embedded signal—an intentional, structured message—suggesting a deeper informational or even extraterrestrial origin behind the blueprint of life on Earth.

title: 3  Frequently Asked Questions
text:
Are we serious?





Yes









Who is the main contributor of this project?

import numpy as np

title: 4  Demo Site
text:
4.5 2D Molecule








Figure 4.5





This is a span that has the class aside which places it in the margin without a footnote number.
As outlined by Crick and Orgel (1973), pp. 16-18, we find this below. Also by referencing this, we end up there1, as outlined in Figure 4.3. Also refer to Figure 4.1 for more details.




Crick, F. H. C., and L. E. Orgel. 1973. “Directed Panspermia.” Icarus 19 (3): 341–46. https://doi.org/10.1016/0019-1035(73)90110-3.
1 Here is the footnote.
